description.value:
A Kit containing various carving knives, dried blood, skin parchments, and various other blasphemous components. Grants +20 to Focus Power Tests requiring Profane Symbols or the like, and +10 to any Tests required as part of a Ritual.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
